title: handing over of said built up amenity the area of built up amenity shall be allowed free of FSI
clause_text: handing over of said built up amenity the area of built up amenity shall be allowed free of FSI. Commencement Certificate in respect of BUA in lieu of the built-up amenity handed over to MCGM can be granted only after handing over of such built up amenity or before availing zonal (basic) FSI beyond 75% of gross plot area or before seeking Occupation Certificate to any part of building/ buildings beyond 75% of admissible BUA, other than the built-up amenity.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
